title: ETFs, CPI, Housing, And Crypto (Podcast)
itunes:title: ETFs, CPI, Housing, And Crypto (Podcast)
description:
Tim Johnston, Partner at Blue Horizon, talks about ETF investing and the Blue Horizon BNE ETF, listed on the NYSE: BNE. Anna Wong, Chief US Economist with Bloomberg Economics, discusses Bloomberg’s recent analysis that says calls for peak inflation may be premature and gives her outlook for Fridays’ CPI data. Taimur Hyat, COO at PGIM, discusses why his firm is bearish on crypto. He also discusses fixed income and investment strategies in 2022. Kenneth Leon, CFRA Research Director, discusses the real estate market and rising mortgage interest rates. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
